q6.question: how do wade and luke make the explosion?
q6.recall: Wade enlists Amos, who works with dynamite, to set up a trap for the car; they will lure it into a quarry and explode the quarry wall, burying it. Luke helps Wade lure the car into the quarry and over the cliff, causing it to explode upon impact.
q6.vectordb: Wade and Luke set up a trap for the car in a quarry and explode the quarry wall, burying it. The car goes flying off the cliff into the quarry below and the men ignite the dynamite and the entire cliffside explodes, burying the car under tons of rubble. The explosion is caused by dynamite.
q6.hybrid: Wade enlists Amos, who works with dynamite, to set up a trap for the car; they will lure it into a quarry and explode the quarry wall, burying it. Luke helps Wade lure the car into the quarry and over the cliff, causing it to explode upon impact.
